alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 2:49PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern New London, northern Middlesex and northeastern New Haven Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 248 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Middletown, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Meriden, Middletown, Wallingford, Colchester, East Hampton, Durham, Salem, Cheshire, Cromwell, Portland, East Haddam, Haddam, Lebanon, Middlefield and Sprague. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London
